thread.section_title: Tiemoue Bakayoko set for Chelsea after snubbing Arsenal transfer – Metro
thread.title: Tiemoue Bakayoko set for Chelsea after snubbing Arsenal transfer
thread.title_full: Tiemoue Bakayoko set for Chelsea after snubbing Arsenal transfer

author: markbrus88
title: Tiemoue Bakayoko set for Chelsea after snubbing Arsenal transfer
text:
Conte looks to have beaten Wenger to Bakayoko (Picture: Getty) Monaco midfielder Tiemoue Bakayoko has reportedly decided on a transfer to Chelsea despite holding personal talks with Arsene Wenger over a move to Arsenal .
£50m Prem star perfect for back three decides on summer move to Chelsea The 22-year-old has had a superb season in Ligue 1 this year, and is attracting interest from all around Europe after establishing himself as one of the most promising young midfielders on the continent.
Reports yesterday claimed Chelsea have agreed a £35million move for Bakayoko , but it is also claimed that Arsenal were desperate to land him.
Bakayoko has been in superb form for Monaco this season (Picture: Getty) According to France Football , Wenger met with the France Under-21 international in a Paris hotel in November, but failed to persuade him to move to the Emirates Stadium.
More: Football Bayern new frontrunners to poach Arsenal's best player for just £35 million 
Real Madrid ace hints he has HUGE problem with Arsenal star on social media 
Marco Verratti reveals the club he would happily leave PSG for 
Arsenal could certainly do with a midfielder of Bakayoko’s quality after the disappointing form of Francis Coquelin and Granit Xhaka this season, but their pursuit looks like being in vain.
Chelsea look to have beaten their rivals to the in-demand star’s signature, in what could give them a fearsome-looking midfield next season alongside this campaign’s man-of-the-moment N’Golo Kante.
MORE: Chelsea could lose major star after transfer gaffe 
MORE: Benzema unhappy at being snubbed in favour of Giroud for France
